# Draft:List of countries that have not committed war crimes

----
Here is a list of countries that have not committed war crimes under their modern form:
{| class="wikitable"
|+
!Country
!Flag
!Notes
|-
|Switzerland
|
|Neutral since it's modern form was created in 1815.
|-
|Germany
|
|The federal republic of germany has not participated in war since it was created in 1949.
|-
|Syria
|
|Syria has not committed war crimes since the Assad regime fell in 2024.
|}
(Edit this if this is wrong)
